com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages

Class PageElement<T extends PageElement<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages.PageElement<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Barcode, FilledButton, Icon, PagePanel, TextBlock, TextButton, WrappedTextBlock

    public abstract class PageElement<T extends PageElement<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Base class for Microsoft Band layout elements

      • setId

        public T setId(int id)
        Method to set the ID of this layout element
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of this layout element
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given id is less than 1 or greater than 65,534 as only these values are accepted by the Microsoft Band firmware
